pageDescription: Calculate your Comprehensive Ranking System (CRS) score for Canadian Express Entry immigration
pageIntro: Express Entry is Canada's application management system for skilled workers. Use our calculator to estimate your Comprehensive Ranking System (CRS) score and see if you qualify for Canadian immigration.

calculator.title: Calculate Your CRS Score
calculator.description: Fill in your details below to calculate your potential Express Entry score. The maximum possible score is 1,200 points.
calculator.scoreExplanation: This is an estimate based on the information you provided. Actual scores may vary based on official assessment.

eligibility.title: Express Entry Eligibility Checker
eligibility.description: Check if you're eligible for one of Canada's Express Entry programs: Federal Skilled Worker Program (FSWP), Canadian Experience Class (CEC), or Federal Skilled Trades Program (FSTP).
eligibility.eligible: You may be eligible for Express Entry
eligibility.notEligible: You may not be eligible for Express Entry
eligibility.eligiblePrograms: Programs you may be eligible for:

reasons.title: Reasons for ineligibility:
reasons.noEnglishTest: No English language test results provided
reasons.insufficientWorkExperience: Less than 1 year of work experience provided

nextSteps.eligible: Based on the information provided, you may be eligible for Express Entry. Consider using our CRS Calculator to estimate your score.
nextSteps.notEligible: Based on the information provided, you may not be eligible for Express Entry. Consider exploring Provincial Nominee Programs or other immigration pathways.

education.twoOrMoreDegrees: Two or more Post-secondary Credentials (one 3+ years)

language.ielts: IELTS - International English Language Testing System
language.celpip: CELPIP - Canadian English Language Proficiency Index Program
language.tcf: TCF - Test de connaissance du français

errors.missingRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.invalidLanguageScore: Language scores must be valid for the selected test
